narratives.actor: You slap that person till they're healed. No idea how that works. Guess you're magic?
narratives.target: {SourceName} slaps you in the face, and your wounds start to close up. How does this even work?
narratives.witness: {SourceName} slaps {TargetName} in the face with astonishing force. Surprisingly {TargetName}'s wounds start to close up as {SourceName} does it again. Why does that work?
